column1: 1617|four-seventeen|Apparently the great Percy has no sense of humour
column2: for at four-seventeen he got tired of it
column3: and hit Skinner crisply in the right eyeball
column4: blacking the same as per illustration.

column1: 1617|seventeen minutes after four|In the next instant she was running toward her house
column2: unmindful of the bags she had dropped
column4: knowing as she glanced down at her watch and saw that it was seventeen minutes after four
column5: that for her time had stopped.
